message: Hi Bob, I'm happy to offer you this product for $11,500. I think it will be very valuable to you and I'm excited to see what you can do with it.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe that's a fair price considering the market value of the product.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the market value, however, the value of this product to me is quite high. I could meet you halfway at $10,500. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to go up to $9,800. Can you consider that?
